Alberto Soro has paid farewell to Zaragoza, the club of his life and start another stage as a Real Madrid player,

Real Madrid & Atlético Madrid interested in Angers left-back Rayan Aït-Nouri

Angers left-back Rayan Aït-Nouri was on Barcelona’s radar under former Director of Football Eric Abidal, who is a strong admirer of the 19-year-old, according to L’Équipe.

Abidal had made contact with Aït-Nouri’s representatives during his time at Camp Nou regarding a potential deal. Real Madrid and Atlético Madrid are also interested in the full-back, with the French outlet reporting that the player has visited Real Madrid’s Valdebebas training facilities. Ligue 1 side Angers reportedly value the player at €30m.

Everton in advanced talks with Real Madrid for James Rodríguez

James Rodriguez is very close to joining Everton from Real Madrid, according to Marca journalist Carlos Carpio.

The agreement could be closed for a fee of €25m to €30m. Carlo Ancelotti is very keen on bringing the Colombian playmaker to Merseyside and has been in touch with the 29-year-old. Rodríguez has made it clear he wants to leave the Santiago Bernabeu and is no longer part of Zinedine Zidane’s plans.
